card_pen_effect: You can target 1 "Dracoslayer" or "Dinomist" card in your other Pendulum Zone; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Dinomight Powerload, the Dracoslayer" once per turn.
card_text: (This card is always treated as a "Dinomist" card.)$NIf this card is Tributed: You can add 1 face-up "Dracoslayer" or "Dinomist" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand, except "Dinomight Powerload, the Dracoslayer". You can only use this effect of "Dinomight Powerload, the Dracoslayer" once per turn.
